title: karuNincavE karagitinE
sahitya:
karuNincavE karagitinE karuNinca vEgaragitinE kannulatO nannu b rOva nI


anupallavi

  parama pAvana vara mantra nilayA karamu joccitini kanikarambutO


caraNam    kalatalu ella kolatimIra nannu alasitinayya AlasyamElE
guru pUjEya nIku arudu gAdu nirupama sundara niratamuga
